description: carved standing fetish figure; swathed in woven vegetable fibre and various fetish charges and the skin of a civet; an antilope horn imbedded in the head; blue glass beads strung about the neck
medium: hard wood, civet skin, monkey skin, woven vegetable fibre, fetish charms including a bundle of feathers, seed pods, animal teeth, antilope horn, glass beads
title: Fetish Figure with Antelope Head
